content-security-policy: specifies the allowed sources of various types of content in the response
x-content-type-options: controls how the browser interprets the response's content type
x-frame-options: specifies whether the response can be displayed in an iframe
x-xss-protection: enables cross-site scripting (xss) protection in the browser
referrer-policy: controls what information is included in the referer header when navigating to external sites
x-content-security-policy: defines a policy for the allowed sources of content (deprecated)
content-security-policy-report-only: defines a policy for the allowed sources of content, but only reports violations (deprecated)
feature-policy: allows selective enabling, disabling, or modifying the behavior of certain browser features or apis
